name: Candlestick Chart
description: This API returns candlestick charts images (base64) so you can use them wherever you want!

api_methods.name: Binance charts
api_methods.description: This endpoint creates candlestick charts for any cryptocurrency listed on [Binance](https://www.binance.com) that you want!

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description:
Symbol for the traiding pair

You can see every traiding pair available [here](https://coinmarketcap.com/en/exchanges/binance)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Amount of candles in the chart

- Default: 16
- Type: Integer. Maximum 1000

parameters.name: interval
parameters.description:
Time interval for each candle.

- Default: 1m

## Time intervals
- m: Minutes
- h: Hours
- d: Days
- w: Weeks
- M: Months

List of intervals:
- 1m
- 3m
- 5m
- 15m
- 30m
- 1h
- 2h
- 4h
- 6h
- 8h
- 12h
- 1d
- 3d
- 1w
- 1M

parameters.name: lastPrice
parameters.description:
The last price that the chart must have. This could be useful if there is some delay between your analysis and the call to this API, and that delay could make a difference between the numbers and the chart. If not given, the chart will be created with Binance last price

- Type: Number

utterances.utterance: Show me a candlestick chart for the BTCUSDT trading pair.
I need a candlestick chart for ETHUSDT with 50 candles.
Generate a candlestick chart for XRPUSDT with a 5-minute interval.
Can you create a candlestick chart for ADAUSDT with the last price set to 2.30?
I'd like a candlestick chart for DOTUSDT with 100 candles and a 1-hour interval.
Provide a candlestick chart for LTCUSDT with a 1-day interval and the last price at 180.
Get me a candlestick chart for BNBUSDT with 200 candles, a 15-minute interval, and the last price at 400.
I want a candlestick chart for SOLUSDT with 500 candles.
Create a candlestick chart for LINKUSDT with a 4-hour interval.
Could you show a candlestick chart for UNIUSDT with 300 candles and the last price at 25?
